summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DXY Macro module implementation. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend DXY Fractal page accessible but DxyMacroTab component integration incomplete.

ui_bugs.issue: DxyMacroTab component not fully integrated in Macro tab - only 3/9 expected elements found

integration_issues.issue: Current Macro tab shows hybrid projection interface instead of DxyMacroTab component
HoverTip components not found or not properly integrated in Macro tab

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/fractal/dxy/terminal?focus=30d returns macro with path and adjustment
Backend: GET /api/dxy-macro-core/score/evidence returns score with evidence
Frontend: DXY Fractal page loads successfully at /dxy route
Frontend: Macro tab exists and is clickable
Frontend: Macro path displayed on chart (Macro + Hybrid paths visible)
Component files exist: DxyMacroTab.jsx and HoverTip.jsx
action_item_for_main_agent: DxyMacroTab component needs proper integration into DXY Fractal Macro tab. Current Macro tab shows different interface. Ensure DxyMacroTab.jsx is imported and used in the DXY Fractal page routing.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (DXY page accessible, Macro tab exists, but DxyMacroTab component not fully integrated)
